misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi, a competitor known for his strategic play and membership at Kullo Golf Club, is set to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.

This marks Ossi's third appearance at the tournament. While he is yet to secure a victory at the Hector Trophée or claim the Victor Trophy, his consistent presence underscores his dedication to the sport.

On the course, Ossi is a figure of quiet intensity. His game is characterized by a conservative approach; he notably avoids using his driver, a decision that has sparked considerable debate and, frankly, some rather juvenile questions about his masculinity. Despite the chatter, Ossi remains unfazed, sticking to his strategy and focusing on precision and course management.
As he prepares for Hector Trophée 2025, Ossi aims to leverage his experience to achieve a personal best and perhaps surprise those who have underestimated him.
